title: Mexico to open embassy in Bangladesh
author: Omar Faruk
description: The Mexican foreign secretary said with a population of over 170 million, Bangladesh is a major player in South Asia.Mexico is interested in boosting business and cooperation with Bangladesh, particularly in the pharmaceutical, agribusiness, and technology sectors, he added.Bangladesh already has an embassy in Mexico.
